entry.data:
SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
